description: Grants the user the ability to turn anyone who feels lust or attraction toward them into stone. The user can also shoot heart-shaped beams that petrify those who harbor impure thoughts.

users.circumstances: Hancock was force-fed the Mero Mero no Mi by the Celestial Dragons during her enslavement for their entertainment when she was between 12-16 years old

abilityReveals.description: Hancock demonstrates the ability to reverse her petrification power when she chooses, restoring Marguerite, Sweet Pea, and Aphelandra to normal.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: After Luffy passes her test by choosing to save the petrified women, Hancock restores them from their stone state.

acquisitionCircumstances.description: Hancock was force-fed the Mero Mero no Mi by the Celestial Dragons who enslaved her, purely for their entertainment and amusement

name.japanese: ヘビヘビの実 モデル：アナコンダ
name.romanized: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Moderu: Anakonda

description: Grants the user the ability to transform into an anaconda snake or a human-anaconda hybrid, providing enhanced strength, constriction abilities, and the ability to use the snake's body for combat.

users.circumstances: Sandersonia was force-fed the Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda by the Celestial Dragons during her enslavement for their entertainment when she was between 12-16 years old

acquisitionCircumstances.description: Sandersonia was force-fed the Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda by the Celestial Dragons who enslaved her, purely for their entertainment and amusement

name.japanese: ヘビヘビの実 モデル：キングコブラ
name.romanized: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Moderu: Kingu Kobura

description: Grants the user the ability to transform into a king cobra snake or a human-king cobra hybrid, providing enhanced strength, poison fangs, and the ability to use the snake's body for combat.

users.circumstances: Marigold was force-fed the Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra by the Celestial Dragons during her enslavement for their entertainment when she was between 12-16 years old

acquisitionCircumstances.description: Marigold was force-fed the Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra by the Celestial Dragons who enslaved her, purely for their entertainment and amusement
